body_html:
maybe this was because the path usr/local/lib dont have the .so file ,so you can cp the .so file to /usr/local/lib then ldconfig.

  • sudo cp /lusr/local/cuda-9.0/libcudart.so.9.0 /usr/local/lib
  • sudo ldconfig
    these steps works
body_text:
maybe this was because the path usr/local/lib dont have the .so  file ,so you can cp the .so file to /usr/local/lib then ldconfig.

sudo cp  /lusr/local/cuda-9.0/libcudart.so.9.0 /usr/local/lib
sudo ldconfig
these steps works
body:
maybe this was because the path usr/local/lib dont have the .so  file ,so you can cp the .so file to /usr/local/lib then ldconfig.
- sudo cp  /lusr/local/cuda-9.0/libcudart.so.9.0 /usr/local/lib 
- sudo ldconfig
these steps works
